meanings.definition: The plural form of putamen, a structure in the brain.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the putamens on the brain scan.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the putamens to understand brain function better.
meanings.sent3: The putamens in the brain were having a party, controlling movements and having fun.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved like putamens in a complex dance, guiding her actions.
meanings.sent5: The putamens were like tiny brain directors, orchestrating movements with precision.

meanings.definition: A group of nuclei in the brain involved in motor control.
meanings.sent1: The putamens work together to coordinate smooth movements.
meanings.sent2: Injury to the putamens can affect a person's ability to control their body.
meanings.sent3: The putamens were on strike, causing the person to trip and stumble comically.
meanings.sent4: His determination was a powerful force, driving his putamens to perfect each step.
meanings.sent5: The putamens pulsed with energy, ensuring every muscle moved in harmony.
